value:
I spent my youth in a hidden hamlet,
without friends... With so many others
here, though, it is never unpleasant.

When my sister, Anthiese, traveled
to the Temple of Mila, I followed
close behind, always out of sight...$k$pMy duty is to swoop in and rescue,
after all!

You are from another world as well,
are you not? Do you miss home?
...No? Then you are tough indeed...

I was hungry, so I made some soup.
Shall we enjoy it together? Come,
join me, $Nu.

Reading heroic tales has been
a favorite pastime of mine since
I was young...$k$pAnd the library here is full of stories
I've never heard of! Just look at all
these books I borrowed!

I have come in search of new friends.
From what I hear, you are a good
one! So says $Nf.
I have grown strong... How delightful!

As expected. Not great...but not so
bad either!

Hmph. I see. I gave it my best, but...
even that is not always enough...

I will keep training until I am
strong enough to protect both
you and Anthiese!

My name is Conrad. Alongside
my sister, Anthiese, I will strive
for perfection!

When I was a child, I survived an
assassination attempt... After that,
I lived in hiding.$k$pI knew nothing of the world...had no
friends... All that kept me going was
my dream of reuniting with my sister.$k$pComing here and meeting others who
have survived similar hardships has
strengthened my resolve even more...$k$pI will exact my vengeance on those
who made me and Anthiese suffer!$k$pEr, well, I would...had Alm not beaten
me to it. To the victor goes the glory,
I suppose... Heh...
はあっ
失せろ！
ぐっ…
この私が…！
Rather foolish!
Know your limits!
Who trained you?
Scatter or fall!
Anthiese...
Heh heh.
I'm Conrad, Anthiese's older brother. I think you and I will get along well, don't you?
Whoa, there! What's that all about?
Can you point me towards Anthiese? I'd like to see if she's just as darling in this world too.
When I wear my mask, I feel like a true knight, sharp and dashing!
What fine weather... Oh! How about we picnic? Let's pack up some lunches!
Anthiese has fallen head over heels for that Alm fellow. I miss her already.
It's a wonderful thing that I can count you among my friends... I can, right? I'm glad.
Very well.
Right.
I'll handle them!
